purpose: The email announces the Call for Papers for the IEEE Artificial Intelligence x Software Engineering (AIxSE) conference scheduled for October 1-3, 2025, in Laguna Hills, California. It highlights the significance of AI in enhancing software engineering practices and invites authors to submit manuscripts in various formats. The email outlines the topics of interest, submission guidelines, and important deadlines for paper submissions and workshop proposals. It also mentions that accepted papers will be considered for inclusion in IEEE Xplore and for awards.

infos:
Subject: IEEE AIxSE 2025 Call for Papers
From: SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>
Reply-To:SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>
Date:Thu, 10 Jul 2025 16:14:12 -0000
Content-Type:text/plain
IEEE Artificial Intelligence x Software Engineering (aka AIxSoftware)
The Hills Hotel, Laguna Hills, California
Software Engineering (SE) deals with the design, development, testing, and maintenance of computer software.
Paper Submission Deadline: July 15, 2025 PT (Extended Deadline)
Workshop Paper Submission Deadline: August 20, 2025 PT
Main Conference and Workshop Registration Deadline: September 1, 2025 PT
You are invited to join the AIxSE community (https://www.aixse.org/community) to receive new announcements and notifications from the conference by email.
